title: Trump DOJ fires immigration court judges across US, union says
shortDescription: The union said judges hear between 500 and 700 cases annually, and the firings will only add to the country's backlog of over 3.5 million cases.

title: Trump says Zelenskyy should not target Moscow
shortDescription: President Trump told reporters that Ukraine should not target Moscow following a report that he advised Ukraine to ramp up its attacks.

title: Trump touts US-Indonesia tariff deal
shortDescription: President Donald Trump claimed the U.S. secured full access in a trade deal with Indonesia, while the Southeast Asian nation will face a 19% tariff.

title: Elmo and AIDS prevention: Congress weighs billion-dollar cuts
shortDescription: Republican lawmakers are considering clawing back $9 billion in federal funds, codifying a slice of cuts proposed by DOGE.

title: Trump touts trade deal with Indonesia that includes 19% tariff
shortDescription: Indonesia also has agreed to purchase billions in U.S. energy, agriculture products and airplanes, Trump said July 15 in a social media post.

title: Trump: ‘Zelenskyy should not target Moscow’
shortDescription: President Trump told reporters Ukrainian President Zelenskyy should not target Moscow.

title: Trump touts $92 billion in AI investments at Pittsburgh summit
shortDescription: The event, organized by McCormick, united industry leaders from finance and tech.

title: Trump's Brazil tariff threatens to spike US coffee prices
shortDescription: US President Donald Trump’s proposed 50% tariff on Brazilian imports could sharply raise US coffee prices, hitting both roasters and consumers.

title: Conservative group sues DOJ for records on Trump shooter
shortDescription: The complaint was filed a day before the one-year anniversary of the Butler, Pennsylvania, shooting that injured Trump and killed an attendee.

title: Trump adviser Michael Waltz defends Signal use, says he wasn't fired
shortDescription: Senators blasted ex-Trump national security adviser Michael Waltz at confirmation hearing for his response to Signalgate.

title: Congressional lawmakers mark the 5th anniversary of John Lewis' death
shortDescription: The Congressional Black Caucus marked the 5th anniversary of Rep. John Lewis' death by vowing to continue to fight for voting rights and civil rights

title: Trump's Education Dept. layoffs got a green light. What now?
shortDescription: The Supreme Court said the layoffs could proceed. What does that mean for students, parents and teachers?

title: SCOTUS lets Trump fire hundreds of Education Department workers
shortDescription: Plus: Trump's latest approach to Ukraine and how some in his inner circle are upset with what's been delivered about Jeffrey Epstein.

title: From 'obsolete' to the 'opposite of that': Trump changes tune on NATO
shortDescription: President Donald Trump has softened his stance on NATO. He once called the Western alliance "obsolete." Now, he says, it's the "opposite of that."

title: What to know about the Education Department as Trump moves to gut it
shortDescription: Here's what to know after a decision by the Supreme Court gives the president a green light to move forward on his promise to gut the agency.

title: Trump considers changing the name 'soccer' to 'football'
shortDescription: 'They call it football, but I guess we call it soccer,’ Trump said in an interview with a sports streaming channel. 'But that change could be made very easily.'

title: Barron Trump: When is the next appearance for very private public figure
shortDescription: Donald and Melania, Trump Jr., Ivanka, Eric, Tiffany, Vanessa, Kai and Donald Trump III have made headlines with their attendance. But where's Barron?

title: Trump looks to dismantle Education Department after court green light
shortDescription: "With this GREAT Supreme Court Decision, our Secretary of Education, Linda McMahon, may begin this very important process," Trump wrote.
